tool_description: Analyzes punctuation usage including comma placement, quotation marks, apostrophes, and end punctuation according to style guide rules.

text.description: Text to validate for punctuation errors

style_guide.description: Punctuation style guide: AP, Chicago, MLA, or APA

check_spacing.description: Whether to check spacing around punctuation marks

error_messages: Unsupported style guide: Use one of [AP, Chicago, MLA, APA].
Empty text: Provide text content for punctuation validation.
Text too long: Maximum 15,000 characters allowed.
usage: Provide text and optionally specify style guide and spacing preferences. Returns punctuation errors with corrections.

error_types.description: Types of punctuation errors (comma, apostrophe, quotation, etc.)
